name: Bicycle
description: The client resides with 6 of her children. The household faces financial difficulties, client prioritizing providing children's basic needs - while having accumulated outstanding debts. This is especially so as 4 children are still studying, while her older 2 children are not working presently and she is the sole breadwinner. Considering their financially tight situation, the family wishes to request for a bicycle through PIO. We would be grateful if the donor can provide/pay for delivery of the bicycle to the client.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

passiton.name: Children bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: TV Console
description: Client is a single mother taking care of 3 young boys on her own.  She is currently unemployed due to health and caregiving issues.  Client had a major surgery 2-3 years ago which affected her strength and employment options.  Besides her 2 school-going sons, client also helps to care for her friend's 3-year old son without any payment as her friend's family is not able to care for the baby.  Family lives in a rental flat and is dependent on financial assistance.  Client recently moved to another rental flat in Bedok and is looking for a TV console.  Please Whatsapp Calyssa at 84848596 or email weiyin.wong@thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

passiton.name: TV Console
passiton.description: Would like to bless this tv console from ikea as I am making way for new furniture. Still in good condition. Dimensions for this console are one of the attached photo.

name: Dining Table
description: Family of 8 living in 2-room rental. Father suffered from stroke and therefore has been unable to secure employment. Mother is the sole caregiver of the whole family. For further liaison, kindly contact Harsheni at 81383741, thank you!

name: TV console
description: The client is a single mother with 2 school-going children, including a child diagnosed with autism who has high caregiving needs. As such, mother is unable to secure any employment and is relying on social assistance for their daily needs. Family is hoping to receive a TV console to place a TV for the children's learning needs, and to organise children's books.

name: Commode
description: 61-year-old patient has late stage cancer and hypertension. He requires a commode at home but he and his wife are unable to afford one. He is medically unfit for work while his wife is his caregiver. Wife hope for a new/unused one as patient are mindful about hygiene. Appreciate if donor can contact me at Whatsapp at 9727 4215. Thank you!

passiton.name: Commode chair with wheels
passiton.description: Very lightly used for shower time only. No rust. Seat pad over the pot allows it to be used as indoor wheelchair.

passiton.name: Wheeled & Decling Commode Chair

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is a cancer patient diagnosed with colorectal cancer (stage 4). His cancer has spread after almost 2 years of treatment and has worsened. He is unfit to work, and his wife is looking after him. Client requires a wheelchair to aid mobility and allow him to travel for his cancer treatments with ease.
specifications: Standard size for adult, preferably with higher back height

passiton.description:
Fully functional foldable wheelchair.
All good except for some rust at the joints

passiton.name: Foldable wheelchair
passiton.description: In good condition with anti-tipppers recently added. Tyres also changed. Added waist buckle, foot straps and body strap.

passiton.name: Foldable mobile wheelchair
passiton.description: Foldable mobile wheelchair that supports maximum weight of 60kg. Self-collection at home address.
